archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.6.1: Users should be authenticated by using token authentication (e.g. physical tokens, soft tokens or smartcards) before they can gain access to critical or sensitive information, business applications, operating systems, endpoint devices or networks.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
